name: touch of the void
description:
touch of the void is my entry for trijam 93, the 3 hour game jam. I missed the mark a little and landed at 3h 32mins.

Shooting stars grant wishes, this is general knowledge. What most people don't know, is that in order to grant them, shooting stars carry their wishes across the galaxy and plant them in a strange plane. You are a void tendril. You decide which wishes you let through to be planted and which ones will never be achieved. A zen game about creating a balanced color palette.

Controls? Move the mouse over the play window to move the tendril.

How do I win? You don't, it's a zen experience. Play as long as it keeps your attention.
